entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Snowfall amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:53 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
